name: P.ray
body:
# Provided as-is
Currently a work-in-progress, and while code will run it doesn't produce any images, or perform any advance functions such as primitive intersection; or primitive generation etcetera.

# TO DO
* Restructure code, and research __slots__
* Implement primitive generation (Spheres)
* Implement intersection for Sphere primitive
* Implement Camera
* Implement rendering-loop
* Implement image-out code & GUI display (Matlab plot)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
